dict.acceptation: 钢琴；<美俚>囚犯工作席；轻奏乐段；

sent.orig: Someone was playing the piano, and the voices that surrounded the piano were vehement and happy.
sent.trans: 有人在弹钢琴，钢琴周围人声鼎沸，欢快。

sent.orig: Piano Instructors: Child and adult instructors, piano grading test tutors; Relevant Certificates is a must.
sent.trans: 钢琴兼职：幼儿、成人陪练教师，钢琴考级辅导教师。具有一定的等级证书。

sent.orig: The piano player is my niece that she did not play piano since two year ago.
sent.trans: 两年没弹琴的侄女，今天被当舅舅的我要求来作即兴表演。

sent.orig: Childrens happy piano education derives from the and criticism of traditional examination-oriented piano education.
sent.trans: 儿童快乐钢琴综合课教学是对传统钢琴教学进行反思后提出的，快乐教育是一种理念。

sent.orig: Andy piano piano green go to school.
